DataShape.description: Data Shape containing the properties for a status definition {PTC.SCA.SCO.StatusDefinition}
DataShape.name: PTC.SCA.SCO.StatusDefinition

FieldDefinition.description: Color used for graphs. Hex color with # tag, default value is black: #000000
FieldDefinition.name: color

FieldDefinition.description: Represents the order of importance in which a status should be displayed
FieldDefinition.name: criticalityOrder

FieldDefinition.description: BOOLEAN (default value is true) to specify if the status expression is editable in the configuration page
FieldDefinition.name: editableExpression

FieldDefinition.description: BOOLEAN (default value is true) to specify if the status is considered for status evaluation and shown in the configuration page
FieldDefinition.name: enabled

FieldDefinition.description: Blank for organization, template or thing name
FieldDefinition.name: entityName

FieldDefinition.description: Represents the order into which the enabled statuses will be evaluated
FieldDefinition.name: evaluationOrder

FieldDefinition.description: Media entity containing the image representing the status
FieldDefinition.name: icon

FieldDefinition.description: String representing the status. Will be used if no localization token or invalid localization token provided
FieldDefinition.name: internalName

FieldDefinition.description: Localization token used to display the name of the status
FieldDefinition.name: localizationToken

FieldDefinition.description: Unique identifier of the status definition. Minimum 0
FieldDefinition.name: statusIndex

FieldDefinition.description: Contains list of time elements for which the status must be included for KPI calculations (ex. APT, PBT)
FieldDefinition.name: timeElement
